name: double-your-free-frist-center-pleasure-this-weekendfreebies
title: Double Your Free Frist Center Pleasure This Weekend [Freebies]
author: Morgan Levy
contentEncoded:
Nashville cheapskates, it’s a weekend to celebrate at the Frist Center! Instead of the usual free day, Regions Bank has upped the ante and sponsored TWO days of free Frist Center goodness for us to enjoy. Today & tomorrow, admission to the Frist is free, courtesy of the aforementioned Regions Bank. And oh-so-conveniently, the Frist’s new exhibition, Masterpieces of European Painting, opens today as well. Get moving!

Regions is also sponsoring free days throughout the year at the Nashville Symphony, Nashville Zoo, Cheekwood, Nashville Children’s Theatre, Adventure Science Center, Nashville Ballet and more. We’ll let you know when these free days are coming up!

This weekend, free hours at the Frist are Friday, February 19 from 10am-9pm and Saturday, February 20 from 10am-5:30pm.

Photo by Powellizer.
